2.8. RolloverÂ¶

Go to Master menu > Rollover.

When the user click on Rollover, it will check for the following conditions:

  • If financial period is not completed then, it prompts for can not rollover, since financial year is not completed!!!.
  • If the financial year has finished,it promts rollover has been done.
  • Rollover will be done only once in a financial period so , if you click on it, again it prompts rollover has done already!!
